00060 namespace Loki
00061 {
00062 
00070     template <class T> struct CreateUsingNew
00071     {
00073         static T* Create()
00074         { return new T; }
00075 
00077         static void Destroy(T* p)
00078         { delete p; }
00079     };
00080 
00089     template<template<class> class Alloc>
00090     struct CreateUsing
00091     {
00092         template <class T>
00093         struct Allocator
00094         {
00095             static Alloc<T> allocator;
00096 
00097             static T* Create()
00098             {
00099                 return new (allocator.allocate(1)) T;
00100             }
00101 
00102             static void Destroy(T* p)
00103             {
00104                 //allocator.destroy(p);
00105                 p->~T();
00106                 allocator.deallocate(p,1);
00107             }
00108         };
00109     };
00110 
00119     template <class T> struct CreateUsingMalloc
00120     {
00122         static T* Create()
00123         {
00124             void* p = std::malloc(sizeof(T));
00125             if (!p) return 0;
00126             return new(p) T;
00127         }
00128 
00130         static void Destroy(T* p)
00131         {
00132             p->~T();
00133             std::free(p);
00134         }
00135     };
00136 
00137 
00148     template <class T> struct CreateStatic
00149     {
00150         union MaxAlign
00151         {
00152             char t_[sizeof(T)];
00153             short int shortInt_;
00154             int int_;
00155             long int longInt_;
00156             float float_;
00157             double double_;
00158             long double longDouble_;
00159             struct Test;
00160             int Test::* pMember_;
00161             int (Test::*pMemberFn_)(int);
00162         };
00163 
00165         static T* Create()
00166         {
00167             static MaxAlign staticMemory_;
00168             return new(&staticMemory_) T;
00169         }
00170 
00172         static void Destroy(T* p)
00173         {
00174             p->~T();
00175         }
00176     };
00177 
00178 
00179 
00194     template
00195     <
00196         typename T,
00197         template <class> class CreationPolicy = CreateUsingNew
00198     >
00199     class SingletonHolder
00200     {
00201     public:
00202 
00204         typedef T ObjectType;
00205 
00207         static T& Instance();
00208 
00209     private:
00210         // Helpers
00211         static void MakeInstance();         
00212         static void DestroySingleton();     
00213 
00214         // Protection
00215         SingletonHolder();
00216 
00217         // Data
00218         typedef T* PtrInstanceType;         
00219         static PtrInstanceType pInstance_;  
00220         static bool destroyed_;             
00221     };
00222 
00224     // SingletonHolder's data
00226 
00227     template
00228     <
00229         class T,
00230         template <class> class C
00231     >
00232     typename SingletonHolder<T, C>::PtrInstanceType
00233         SingletonHolder<T, C>::pInstance_ = 0;
00234 
00235     template
00236     <
00237         class T,
00238         template <class> class C
00239     >
00240     bool SingletonHolder<T, C>::destroyed_ = false;
00241 
00243     // SingletonHolder::Instance
00245 
00246     template
00247     <
00248         class T,
00249         template <class> class CreationPolicy
00250     >
00251     inline T& SingletonHolder<T, CreationPolicy>::Instance()
00252     {
00253         if (!pInstance_)
00254         {
00255             MakeInstance();
00256         }
00257         return *pInstance_;
00258     }
00259 
00261     // SingletonHolder::MakeInstance (helper for Instance)
00263 
00264     template
00265     <
00266         class T,
00267         template <class> class CreationPolicy
00268     >
00269     void SingletonHolder<T, CreationPolicy>::MakeInstance()
00270     {
00271         if (!pInstance_)
00272         {
00273             if (destroyed_)
00274             {
00275                 destroyed_ = false;
00276             }
00277             pInstance_ = CreationPolicy<T>::Create();
00278         }
00279     }
00280 
00281     template
00282     <
00283         class T,
00284         template <class> class CreationPolicy
00285     >
00286     void
00287     SingletonHolder<T, CreationPolicy>::DestroySingleton()
00288     {
00289         assert(!destroyed_);
00290         CreationPolicy<T>::Destroy(pInstance_);
00291         pInstance_ = 0;
00292         destroyed_ = true;
00293     }

00314     template<class T>
00315     class LOKI_SINGLETON_EXPORT Singleton
00316     {
00317     public:
00318         static T& Instance();   
00319     };

00328 #define LOKI_SINGLETON_INSTANCE_DEFINITION(SHOLDER)                     \
00329 namespace Loki                                                          \
00330 {                                                                        \
00331     template<>                                                          \
00332     SHOLDER::ObjectType&  Singleton<SHOLDER::ObjectType>::Instance()    \
00333     {                                                                   \
00334         return SHOLDER::Instance();                                     \
00335     }                                                                    \
